14 Gregory Hall Urbana, Illinois
April 5, 1957
Elliott

716 Jackson Place, N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
Dear Dr. Elliott:
In bringing our billing records up-to-date, we
note that we have no record of your having been billed
for the NAEB-TV Research Fact Sheets for7i957^> The UniÂ¬
versity of Illinois will therefore send yptrtsuch a bill
shortly. If you do not want to continue receiving our
Fact Sheets, please let me know by returning the enclosed
postcard.
Please feel free to write me if you have any
questions regarding your subscription to the Fact Sheet
Service.
